Further, provide a specialist advisory function to Commercial, Business Execution and Logistics teams on matters relating to management, classification, labelling, packaging and permits for raw and secondary feed materials, products and by-products.', 'title': 'Materials Stewardship Specialist', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Port Pirie, South Australia', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}}, 'company': 'Nyrstar', 'description': 'Ensure that Nyrstar Port Pirie complies with stakeholder expectations for Environment and Quality.  Liaise with stakeholders (internal and external) to determine their expectations (legal and other) and deliver a work plan to manage risks, monitor & report performance and improve the capability of people, equipment and systems.  

Maintain registers of stakeholder expectations, environmental aspects and quality risks, then use the registers to develop and implement risk treatment strategies to reduce business risks.  Responsible for the reliability of environmental monitoring and control equipment (both directly through the Environment Team and indirectly through the operating departments). Collate and analyse environmental data to prepare reports for internal and external stakeholders.  Responsible for the delivery of the annual audit program (internal and external), and support/facilitate incident investigations, as required.   
  
Build the capability of people by conducting inductions, attending monthly meetings and coaching individuals (Environment Team and plant areas).  Build the capability of equipment by identifying and supporting improvement projects (including obtaining approvals where required).  Build the capability of the work system by providing direction and support for nine Systems Officers.', 'title': 'Senior Adviser - Environment & Quality', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Port Pirie, South Australia', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2003}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}}, 'company': 'Nyrstar', 'description': 'I led the environment team, and was responsible for environmental monitoring and reporting for the multi-metals smelter.  I coordinated environmental research and improvement projects.  This included a five-year marine study, a groundwater study, atmospheric modelling and a Sulphur Dioxide health risk assessment.

During this time I obtained ISO14001 certification of the environmental management system.  I helped arrange a citizen’s jury to prioritise environmental issues for a new ten-year licence from the Environment Protection Authority.  I participated in the launch the tenby10 project to reduce children’s blood Lead levels.
